# detailText

**Instance Property**

The list item’s secondary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var detailText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The list item displays any secondary text below its primary text.

## Managing Content

- **text**: The list item’s primary text.
- **trailingText**: The list item’s supplementary text.
title: detailText
